read_file module¶

read_file.narrow(checked, DASHRlut)¶

Returns dictionary mapping selected DASHRs to local drives.

Parameters:
  • checked – array of integer pins
  • DASHRlut – dictionary mapping of all locally detected DASHRs
Returns:

dictionary mapping only user-selected DASHRs
read_file.read_DASHR(pin, location, now)¶

Downloads data fom a single DASHR.

Parameters:
  • pin – pin of chosen DASHR
  • location – drive path of chosen DASHR
Returns:

array of binaries describing whether each file was read
read_file.read_file_data(filepath, pin, time_session)¶

Reads file and stores data in database based on creation date. Encodes data to base64 before storing. Returns 0, 1, or a note.

Parameters:
  • filepath – path on local machine where file can be found
  • pin – DASHR from which data is being read
  • time_session – datetime of the session - ie when files are harvested
Returns:

1 if saved, 0 if not, str(error) if error
read_file.read_selected(chosen)¶

Downloads data from all selected DASHRs.

Parameters:chosen – dictionary mapping selected DASHRs to local drives
Returns:log as dictionary
